original_title: Linsen: Das Rezept gegen den Welthunger
overview: Lentils are undemanding plants from drier regions, yet at the same time they are extremely rich in protein and are real power packs, full of minerals and trace elements. Scientists from around the world are working on attempts to develop them for use as wonder weapons against famine. The lentil researchers make use of state-of-the-art biotechnology in order to make the undemanding pulses even more profitable and resistant.  Lentils - Food For The Future Full credit to Frigge Mehring
title: Lentils: A Miracle Of Nutrition
